Srsly?[/bq]
Call me crazy, but I'm super glad all that drama shit has been going on the social marxist conspiracy by sjw picked the worst imaginable opponent when it comes to a culture war.  If they picked a fight with mainstream music they would have won; if they picked a fight with mainstream movies they would have won, but they picked a fight with geeks.  Think about geek culture for a second; from day one geeks are programmed to win no matter what.  There's gamers that spend weeks non-stop to achieve things and sjw believe that they could take control of all of geek culture? 0% fucking chance of sjw succeeding to take control of geek culture.
